seriesJson.title: Impetus
seriesJson.description: A program about books that have given shape to the 20th century.

node.title: Kapital
node.description: This program features host Joseph J. Schwab and guest Abram L. Harris  discussing "Kapital" by Karl Marx.

node.title: Theory of the Leisure Class
node.description: This program features host Joseph J. Schwab and guest T.V. Smith discussing "The Theory of the Leisure Class: An Economic Study of Institutions" by Thorstein Veblen.
